meanings.sent1: Earthlings are the beings that call Earth their home.
meanings.sent2: Many earthlings enjoy exploring the natural beauty of their planet.
meanings.sent3: The earthlings gathered to celebrate the annual Earth Day festival.
meanings.sent4: To the aliens, we are just tiny earthlings on a vast planet.
meanings.sent5: The children's book featured colorful earthlings from different parts of the world.

meanings.sent1: Earthlings come in all shapes, sizes, and colors.
meanings.sent2: Some earthlings dream of traveling to outer space one day.
meanings.sent3: The earthlings were excited to welcome visitors from another galaxy.
meanings.sent4: In the vast universe, earthlings are just a small part of the population.
meanings.sent5: The movie depicted a group of brave earthlings fighting to save their planet.
